snippet: GENATT--Les. A very dear and longtime friend. We shared many happy times for over 35 years. Our heartfelt condolences to Judy and the entire Genatt family. Les, we will miss you. Shelly and Joan Ratner and family 1/3
lead_paragraph: GENATT--Les. A very dear and longtime friend. We shared many happy times for over 35 years. Our heartfelt condolences to Judy and the entire Genatt family. Les, we will miss you. Shelly and Joan Ratner and family 1/3
